body.p: Although the proposed approach for the calculation of year‑to‑date diluted earnings per share would have converged with US SFAS 128, the Board concluded that the approach was inconsistent with IAS 34 and that it could not mandate the frequency of interim reporting. The US Financial Accounting Standards Board has agreed to consider this difference as part of the joint short‑term convergence project with the IASB as well as the issue noted in paragraph BC9.
